description: No action.
label: Uber

description: A character that allows you to draw another card when played. The extra card may be drawn from the character or the Skills deck.
label: Clan Lord (Draw 1 Card)

description: A character that doubles the value of tools played on it
label: Clan Lord (Double Weapon Value)

description: A character that adds 1 point to any attached Styles. The Styles with an extra point are placed sideways to indicate that they have one more point value. (See Figure 3)
label: Clan Lord (Styles +1 Point)

description: A character who knocks one opposing character out of play. The player declares an Opponent's character to be defeated when the character is played. Only a character with no Styles or Weapons attached may be defeated.
label: Clan Lord (Knockout Character)

description: A character that makes you discard a card when played.
label: Lieutenant (Discard 1)

description: A character who knocks a Style out of play. The player declares a Style to be overcome. Only a Style that is exposed may be overcome.
label: Lieutenant (Knockout Style)

description: A character who knocks a Weapon out of play. The player declares a Weapon to be crushed. Only a Weapon that is exposed may be crushed.
label: Lieutenant (Knockout Weapon)

description: A Special Character who can play monks. Once this card is played, subsequent characters can be Monks or Clans during that Challenge.
label: Lieutenant (Can Play Monks)

description: A character that lets you steal a card from an Opponent's hand. The player may choose which Opponent to steal from.
label: Lieutenant (Steal Card)

description: A character who may not play any skills.
label: Lieutenant (No Styles)

description: A character who may not play any tools.
label: Lieutenant (No Weapons)

description: No action.
label: Guard

description: No action.
label: Thug

description: A character that adds 1 point to any attached Styles. The Styles with an extra point are placed sideways to indicate that they have one more point value. (See Figure 3)
label: Master Monk (Styles +1 Point)

description: A character that doubles the value of tools played on it
label: Master Monk (Double Weapon Points)

description: A character that lets you steal a card from an Opponent’s hand. The player may choose which Opponent to steal from.
label: Monk Warrior (Steal Card)

description: A character who brings another character into the field with him. When this card is played, the player can play another character from their hand.
label: Monk Warrior (Play Another Character)

description: A character who captures a Weapon. The player takes a Weapon that has been played from an Opponent.  Only a Weapon that is exposed may be captured. The player may play the captured Weapon on any of his characters in the field, even if a Weapon has already been played on that character.  (An exception to the one Weapon per character rule.)
label: Monk Warrior (Capture Weapon)

description: No action.
label: Teacher

description: No action.
label: Acolyte

description: A Special Character who is immune to other character's Styles. Immunity extends to any Styles or Weapons attached to the character.
label: Special (Immune)

description: A character that makes you trade hands with another player.
label: Special (Trade Hands)

description: A Special Character who can use two Weapons. (An exception to the one tool per character rule).
label: Special (2 Weapons)

description: A Special Character who can acquire two Styles at once. The player may play two Styles on this character for each play.
label: Special (Double Styles)

description: No action.
label: Uber Style

description: No action.
label: Style

description: No action.
label: Style

description: No action.
label: Style

description: No action.
label: Style

description: No action.
label: Uber Weapon

description: No action.
label: Weapon

description: No action.
label: Weapon

description: No action.
label: Weapon

description: No action.
label: Weapon

description: A card that nullifies a Style that has been played by an Opponent. The Monkey Wrench is placed on an exposed Style in the Opponent's field.
label: Nullify Style

description: A card that wipes all cards from the field for all players, including the player who played the Monkey Wrench. The Monkey Wrench may be played on any card in the field. The Challenge may continue with the next play.
label: Clear Field

description: A card that disarms a character played by an Opponent. The Opponent cannot play Styles or Weapons on that character. The Monkey Wrench only be played if a character has no Weapons or Styles attached.
label: Disarm Player

description: Each player draws 2 more Skills.
label: Draw 2 Skills

description: No Styles may be played for this Challenge.
label: No Styles

description: Each player draws 1 more character.
label: Draw 1 Character

description: No Weapons may be played for this Challenge.
label: No Weapons

description: Each player must take a random card from the player to their left. A card drawn from another player cannot be included in the random draw.
label: Random Steal

description: Each player must discard two cards before the Challenge begins.
label: Discard 2 Cards

description: Characters are worth one more point, except for UberCharacters.
label: Point Increase

description: The values on Clans and Monks are flipped. A 4 becomes a 1, a 3 becomes a 2, a 2 becomes a 3, and a 1 becomes a 4. These characters are turned upside down when played.  Uber characters and Special Characters are not affected.
label: Flip Values
